advanced.code:
graph LR
    A[New Version] --> B[AI Risk Assessment]
    B --> C{Risk Level}
    C -->|Low| D[Full Deploy]
    C -->|Medium| E[Canary 10%]
    C -->|High| F[Manual Review]
    E --> G[AI Monitor Metrics]
    G --> H{Success?}
    H -->|Yes| I[Canary 50%]
    H -->|No| J[Auto-Rollback]
    I --> K[AI Monitor]
    K --> L{Success?}
    L -->|Yes| D
    L -->|No| J
    D --> M[Production]
    J --> N[Alert + Report]
